ygData.subject: Re: Boat problems
ygData.msgSnippet: which is what i did exactly (swim past dock).  another problem to watch for, as i found out, even though it looks as if you are swimming, keep checking the
ygData.messageBody:
which is what i did exactly (swim past dock). another problem to watch for, as
i found out, even though it looks as if you are swimming, keep checking the
/loc. I thought i was going forward for 20 mins only to realize stupidly that i
was paddling against the server wall. Be sure to call out for the loc of the
docks and dont worry if your yellow bar goes all the way down, you can't drown
from swimming as long as you stay on top of the water.

Roop Dirump wrote:

> Memorize the Jig O Vigor and start peddling! I've swum from just that very
> spot, drunk and fell overboard myself. Best start swimming, hit autorun and
> sit back and eat some raman. Perhaps you'll get lucky and someone will come
> to hunt there. Try calling out to people to get the LOC of a dock, then
> head for it. Now truthfully, you shouldn't be that far from the first dock
> at all. Unless you swim past it.
>
> Roop
>
